name: NPR
text:
Justices Clarence Thomas and Samuel Alito said the Supreme Court's 2015 Obergefell v. Hodges decision — which established a constitutional right to same-sex marriage — has hurt religious liberty and "created a problem that only it can fix."
https://t.co/vsUeQ2ZwEp

name: NPR
text:
The viral "Get Your Booty To The Poll" PSA is a different kind of voter outreach effort — one that has sparked conversations about who isn't being reached by current efforts.
https://t.co/fIy6AyJMh5
